Uses of Class
humanize.time.PrettyTimeFormat

Packages that use PrettyTimeFormat

Uses of PrettyTimeFormat in humanize
 

Methods in humanize that return PrettyTimeFormat
static PrettyTimeFormat Humanize.prettyTimeFormat()
           Returns a thread-safe PrettyTimeFormat instance.
static PrettyTimeFormat Humanize.prettyTimeFormat(Locale locale)
           Same as Humanize.prettyTimeFormat() for the specified locale.
